timeline.message:
Add issue template categories

This commit splits the singular legacy issue template into individual
categories. The UI is much nicer when creating an issue, and hopefully
will be more clear to users without needing to read through a bunch of
text.

timeline.bodyText: Can we wrap this at 80 columns?

timeline.bodyText: This doesn't feel great but it's a good start. I think we can express this in a way that is more welcoming.
